alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:22AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson, Benton, southeastern Carroll and northern Decatur Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1121 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Natchez Trace State Park, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parkers Crossroads, Wildersville, Clarksburg, Westport, Parker`s Cross Roads, Dollar, Jeannette, I-40 Near The Tennessee River, Holladay, Sugar Tree, Garretsburg, Yuma, Cozette, Buena Vista and Nathan Bedford Forrest State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
